Potential 1.title: Positive Feedback
Potential 1.description: After recovering SP with skills, Akekuri gains ATK +10% for 10s. This effect can reach 5 stacks.

Potential 3.title: Committed Team Player
Potential 3.description: Ultimate SQUAD! ON ME! improved: While ultimate is active, entire team gains ATK +10%.

Potential 4.title: Super Perfect Status
Potential 4.description: Ultimate SQUAD! ON ME! improved: Ultimate Energy cost -10%.

Potential 5.title: Tempo of Awareness
Potential 5.description: Talent Staying in the Zone improved: Even when the ultimate SQUAD! ON ME! ends, the Link buff persists for 5s.
